question: Which Grand Slam tennis tournament's home is "Billie Jean King National Tennis Center"?
explanation: The USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center is a stadium complex in New York City, United States. It has been the home of the US Open Grand Slam tennis tournament, played every year in August and September, since 1978 and is operated by the United States Tennis Association (USTA). The complex's three stadiums are among the largest tennis stadiums in the world; Arthur Ashe Stadium tops the global list with a listed capacity of 23,200.
